---
title: Copper-Zinc Superoxide dismutase (CuZnSOD)
---

Copper-Zinc Superoxide dismutase (CuZnSOD) is one of 3 human isoforms of the [Superoxide Dismutases (SOD) group]({{< var ref-superoxide-dismutases-group.path >}}) @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019. 


# Genetics
CuZnSOD is encoded by the [SOD1 gene]({{< var ref-sod1.path >}})
